entry.title: Crypto Game-Changer: Denmark To Introduce 1st Ever Unrealized Gains Tax
entry.summary:
Benjamin Franklin, a well-known American statesman, said: ‚ÄúNothing is certain in this world except death and taxes.‚Äù It‚Äôs a remark that might now hold true to crypto, as Denmark plans to impose a new taxation policy that targets the unrealized capital gains of cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin.
Denmark: Tax Reform For Crypto Assets
The Danish government is about to make a bold move of initiating a pioneering tax reform covering digital assets like Bitcoin.
It is considered as an unprecedented step as the cryptocurrency space has been subject of government regulations in many countries and the ongoing debate on implementing more government regulations and taxation on it.
According to the Danish government, tax authorities will start collecting a 42% tax on cryptocurrencies‚Äô unrealized‚Ä¶

entry.title: Pennsylvania House Passes ‚ÄòBitcoin Rights‚Äô Bill With Bipartisan Support
entry.summary:
The Pennsylvania House of Representatives has made a significant move in the cryptocurrency regulation landscape in the US by passing the ‚ÄòBitcoin Rights‚Äô bill with ‚Äúoverwhelming‚Äù bipartisan support.¬†
A Landmark Move For Bitcoin Rights
The bill, officially known as House Bill 2481, received a decisive vote of 176 to 26, with 76 Democrats and all 100 Republicans backing the measure.¬†
The bill aims to protect the rights of individuals to self-custody their digital assets, affirm their ability to use Bitcoin for payments, and establish explicit guidelines for the taxation of Bitcoin transactions.¬†
After the upcoming election, the bill will advance to the Republican-led Pennsylvania Senate, and if approved, it will be sent to Governor Josh Shapiro for final approval.
Crafted in col‚Ä¶

entry.title: How Walrus Protocol Unlocks New Applications for Decentralized Data Storage
entry.summary: Mysten Labs Chief Scientist George Danezis joined Decrypt to talk about its new decentralized storage protocol Walrus, which promises to unlock new applications such as AI and social media, thanks to its novel Red Stuff data encoding algorithm.

entry.title: Why Coinbase Sees Crypto as a Bipartisan, 'Purple' Political Issue
entry.summary: Coinbase VP of Corporate and Business Development, Shan Aggarwal, joined Decrypt's Sander Lutz and Liz Napolitano at Messari Mainnet 2024 to discuss the exchange's efforts to grow mainstream crypto adoption‚Äîand how the changing political conversation around digital assets is rapidly playing a major role in that.

entry.title: Binance Is Playing Offense‚ÄîNot Just Defense‚ÄîAgainst Crypto Crime, Says Head of Financial Investigations
entry.summary: Nils Anderson R√∂ed, the exchange‚Äôs global head of financial investigations, sat down with Decrypt‚Äôs Sander Lutz at Messari Mainnet 2024 to discuss how Binance is proactively dismantling criminal networks around the world, the strategy with which the crypto exchange is approaching sensitive conflicts in the Middle East, and more.
